name: Finding Balance
description:
Finding Balance, by Cactus Farm.

Finding Balance is a puzzle game that requires players to step on color-coded pressure plates in order to complete each level, while simultaneously keeping the level balanced. Every challenge gets progressively harder than the last.

Controls

WASD: Move

Left Click: Switch characters

Right-Click: Pick up small glowing boxes

R: Reset level

Credits

CODE: wooshdude

MUSIC: JDMC

This was made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49.
